BasicInfo.short: Cardinal Blue Software offers an app that allows users to create and share free-form collages made by images, text and stickers.

Products.name: PicCollage
Products.description: PicCollage lets you instantly arrange your photos into frames - or get creative with freeform collages, cutouts, filters, borders,
